title: 39: Catching Up with Bailee Ann
itunes:title: Catching Up with Bailee Ann
description:
The most requested and popular guest, Bailee Ann, rejoins Bunnie this week to have some fun and spill some tea! Bailee catches us up on what life in 6th grade is really like, her best advice to handle bullies, and what’s it’s really like growing up with Bunnie and Jelly as parents. She also dishes the info on her verse in Jelly’s upcoming song, when we can expect to see her on tour, and how long it will be before she joins the family and gets her own channel on YouTube. 

 

Takeaways:

  • Bunnie and Jelly have simple advice for bullies — just knock ‘em out! However, Bailee Ann subscribes to the idea that it’s good to try and ration with them first, and make sure you aren’t dealing with the situation alone. Then, if all else fails, punch them. 
  • Bailee’s music school, School of Rock, has been such a great experience and is shaping up Bailee and her band to be their very own performing rock stars. 
  • Bailee wrote her own verse to Jelly’s song, “Beautiful Disaster”, and even Bunnie couldn’t hide her poker face of how impressed she was. The song will be out Feb 21. 
  • Yes, Bailee really did wear a sweatshirt with a woman’s bare boobies on them to school, and you can thank Bunnie’s eyesight for the whole situation. 
  • Bailee is so pumped to join Jelly for some tour dates when she can, and even more excited to hang with Tech N9ne on the shows. 
  • Mark your calendar now — September 19, 2020, will be with first Dumb Blonde live podcast! Location and more details coming soon. 
  • Bunnie and Bailee both have similar stories of growing up in less than ideal situations with their mother, but it is their job to break the cycle and keep trucking while showing love and kindness for others. 
  • Just like her favorite animal the koala, Bailee and her Gemini self have a sweet side, and a side you don’t want to mess with! 
  • Let’s all encourage Bailee to get her 10 vlogs filmed and edited, so she can launch a YouTube channel already! 

 

Quotes: 

  • “Your first kiss ever was with tongue??” - B 
  • “When you have this much Botox in your face, it’s hard to smile.” - Bunnie 
  • “It’s an old saying, but I’ll throw up if I picture everyone in their underwear. Ew.” - B
  • “You’ve got to learn how to stand up for yourself, and you can’t deal with bullying alone.” - B
  • “If I had your life as a kid, I’d be Bill Gates right now.” - Bunnie 
  • “Hurt people hurt people.” - Bunnie 
  • “You gotta get a job with your family. If we have to do work all day, so do you!” - Bunnie 

 

Mentioned: 

@baileeannnnn

School of Rock 

Percy Jackson

PS, I Love You 

To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before 

@TechN9ne 

Jelly Roll: Twitter | Website | Instagram | YouTube 

 

Check out Bunnie: 

@xomgitsbunnie

BunnieXo 

@officialdumbblonde
